resource: 1002283.derived=false 1002283.vtc=true 1002283.1002622.1000862.description=The Toyota Tire Pressure Monitor alerts the driver when tire pressure is critically low. For optimal tire wear and performance, tire pressure should be checked regularly with a gauge; do not rely solely on the monitor system. See your Owner’s Manual for details. 1002283.description=The Toyota Tire Pressure Monitor alerts the driver when tire pressure is critically low.
